Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.santorini.communication

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    GameMessage
    Brief Serializable object representing the message exchanged between client and server which contains game data
    ImmutableCard
    Brief Class representing an immutable god card, used for the communication between client and server
    ImmutablePosition
    Brief Class that represents an immutable 2D position used for the communication between client and server
    InterruptionMessage
    Brief Message sent when it's necessary to interrupt what the client was doing before
    KickMessage
    Brief Message exchanged when the game isn't over but there's a loser who must be kicked out from the game
    LobbyMessage
    Brief Message exchanged during the lobby phase or when it's necessary to send just a textual message
    QuitMessage
    Brief Message containing a quit request and the consequent answer
    SerializableMessage
    Brief Serializable class for the exchange of the messages between client and server
    TextMessage
    Brief Message containing a textual content and the value of a start request
    WinMessage
    Brief Special message sent in case of win by some player
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    MethodHeading
    Brief Enum containing the headings for the methods to call on the view
    NetworkMessage
    Brief Enum for the print of a specific message on client side
